ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this service is enabled.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.
Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.

ResourceBlocks.longDescription: This property shall contain the link to a collection of type ResourceBlockCollection.
ResourceBlocks.description: The resource blocks available on the service.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

ResourceZones.longDescription: This property shall contain the link to a collection of type ZoneCollection.
ResourceZones.description: The resource zones available on the service.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompositionService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the Composition Service Properties for a Redfish implementation.
CompositionService.description: This is the schema definition for the Composition Service.  It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to the actual list of resources available for composition.

title: #CompositionService.v1_0_0.CompositionService
